name: Verify critical path navigation
description: Verify that a player can start a new game and successfully navigate through the first checkpoint without errors
testObjective: Validate the core game initialization and basic navigation functionality
author: QA Team

steps.action: Complete character setup and start game
steps.expected: Game starts at the initial spawn point

steps.action: Navigate to the first checkpoint area
steps.expected: Player can move through the environment without crashes
Checkpoint is activated and player progresses to next area

postconditions: Game state is saved at checkpoint
Player has progressed past first area
